statements: SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory;
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_quantity > 100;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT material_name FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_quantity < 50 ORDER BY material_quantity ASC, material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory WHERE material_quantity > 50 ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(material_location) FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) as total_quantity FROM BuildingMaterialsInventory GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 3;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM building_materials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT log_id, material_id, action FROM inventory_log;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM building_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND action = 'received' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT material_name, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_name HAVING avg_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM building_materials bm JOIN inventory_log il ON bm.material_id = il.material_id WHERE il.action = 'used' ORDER BY bm.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM MaterialSuppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM MaterialSuppliers WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT material_name, location FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs WHERE quantity_change < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT supplier_name, material_name, contact_info FROM MaterialSuppliers JOIN BuildingMaterials ON MaterialSuppliers.material_id = BuildingMaterials.material_id
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM BuildingMaterials GROUP BY material_name
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM building_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM material_orders WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, material_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM material_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT material_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 500;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM building_materials WHERE quantity > 100;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, order_date FROM building_materials b JOIN material_orders o ON b.material_id = o.material_id JOIN material_suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_name = 'Supplier ABC';
SELECT material_name, new_quantity, transaction_date FROM building_materials b JOIN material_transactions t ON b.material_id = t.material_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'Incoming';
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM building_materials_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM material_categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM material_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, material_id, quantity_change, transaction_date FROM material_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM building_materials_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM building_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM building_materials_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM building_materials_inventory WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B') AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY location, quantity DESC;
